Query: SELECT PUBLICATION.pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION WHERE PUBLICATION.pubYear >= 2000 AND PUBLICATION.pubYear <= 2017
Test Case: Seq Scan (two conditions connected with AND, with table name)

Query: SELECT pubKey, pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION WHERE pubTitle >= pubKey
SELECT P.pubKey, P.pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION AS P WHERE P.pubTitle >= P.pubKey
Test Case: Seq Scan (with alias, compare two columns)

Query: SELECT PUBLICATION.pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION WHERE PUBLICATION.pubYear >= 2000 AND (PUBLICATION.pubType = 'book' OR PUBLICATION.pubType = 'article')
SELECT PUBLICATION.pubKey, PUBLICATION.pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION WHERE PUBLICATION.pubYear >= 2000 AND PUBLICATION.pubTitle LIKE '%data%'
SELECT * FROM PUBMONTH WHERE PUBMONTH.pubKey = 'books/aw/AhoHU83'
SELECT PUBLISHER.publisherid FROM PUBLISHER WHERE PUBLISHER.publisherid < 10
SELECT PUBLICATION.pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION WHERE PUBLICATION.pubKey = 'books/aw/AhoHU83' AND PUBLICATION.pubYear <= 2017
SELECT * FROM PUBLICATION WHERE PUBLICATION.pubKey = 'books/aw/AhoHU83' OR PUBLICATION.pubKey = 'books/aw/ArnoldG99'
Test Case: Bitmap Index Scan & Bitmap Heap Scan

Query: SELECT PROCEEDING.proceedbooktitle, INPROCEEDING.inprobooktitle FROM INPROCEEDING, PROCEEDING WHERE PROCEEDING.pubKey = INPROCEEDING.inproCrossRef
SELECT P.proceedbooktitle, I.inprobooktitle FROM INPROCEEDING AS I, PROCEEDING AS P WHERE P.pubKey = I.inproCrossRef
SELECT PROCEEDING.proceedbooktitle, INPROCEEDING.inprobooktitle FROM INPROCEEDING, PROCEEDING WHERE PROCEEDING.pubKey = INPROCEEDING.inproCrossRef
SELECT * FROM PUBLISHER, SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL.schoolID = PUBLISHER.publisherID
Test Case: Nested Loop (index condition reversed, after 'set enable_hashjoin = off; set enable_mergejoin = off;')

Query: SELECT P.proceedbooktitle, I.inprobooktitle, PUBLICATION.pubTitle FROM INPROCEEDING AS I, PROCEEDING AS P, PUBLICATION WHERE P.pubKey = I.inproCrossRef AND I.pubKey = PUBLICATION.pubKey
SELECT PUBLICATION.pubType, PUBLICATION.pubYear, COUNT(*) FROM PUBLICATION GROUP BY PUBLICATION.pubType, PUBLICATION.pubYear
SELECT PUBLICATION.pubType, PUBLICATION.pubYear, COUNT(*) FROM PUBLICATION GROUP BY PUBLICATION.pubType, PUBLICATION.pubYear HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10
SELECT PUBLICATION.pubYear, PUBLICATION.pubKey FROM PUBLICATION ORDER BY PUBLICATION.pubYear
SELECT pubYear, pubKey FROM PUBLICATION ORDER BY pubYear DESC, pubKey ASC
Test Case: Sort (Two columns, DESC, ASC, no table name)

ORDER BY PUBYEAR DESC,
	PUBKEY ASC

Query: SELECT PUBLICATION.pubYear, PUBLICATION.pubType, COUNT(*) as pubCount FROM PUBLICATION GROUP BY PUBLICATION.pubType, PUBLICATION.pubYear ORDER BY pubCount DESC, PUBLICATION.pubYear
SELECT pubYear AS year, pubTitle FROM PUBLICATION ORDER BY year LIMIT 10
SELECT AUTHORSHIP.personKey, COUNT(*) FROM AUTHORSHIP GROUP BY AUTHORSHIP.personKey
WITH cte AS (select pubYear, pubTitle from PUBLICATION  where pubYear = 2000) select * from cte;
WITH cte AS (select pubYear, pubTitle from PUBLICATION  where pubYear = 2000) select pubTitle from cte where pubTitle LIKE '%data%';
SELECT DISTINCT PUBLICATION.pubKey FROM PUBLICATION
